Functions
BG_InitGameBoard
bool BG_InitGameBoard(
int *game_board,
int grid_size,
int init_type,
int init_value,
int value_type
)

Initialize the game board.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

grid_size
int

size of game board grid ex [3x3] or [9x9]. Provide only row or col like '3' for [3x3] grid or '9' for [9x9] grid.

init_type
int

Initialize board sequentially,alternate or Row/Col wise values, Use Enum BOARD_INIT for more information.

init_value
int

Initialize board with this value. [Parameter is ignored when value_type is RAND_VALUE].

value_type
int

Type of value like Incremented/Decremented or plain value. Use Enum VALUE_TYPE for more information.

Returns

If initialize was success it returns TRUE otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_DrawGameBoard
void BG_DrawGameBoard(
int *game_board,
int board_x,
int board_y,
char *board_pieces,
int board_pieces_len,
int board_type
)

Draw the game board.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

board_x
int

X-Position of board.

board_y
int

Y-Position of board.

board_pieces
char*

Array of board pieces to show on board like ('X' or 'O' in TicTacToe) and so on.

board_pieces_len
int

Length of game board pieces array.

board_type
int

Type of board to draw sequential or alternate, Use Enum BOARD_TYPE to provide values.

BG_GetBoardInfo
void BG_GetBoardInfo(
BG_BoardInfo *board_info,
size_t pieces_len,
bool print_info
)

Get board information such as Rows,Columns,diagonals. start/end positions or length etc..

Parameters
board_info
BG_BoardInfo*

Array to receive information of board . Must be of type 'BG_BoardInfo'.

pieces_len
size_t

Length of 'board_info' array. Must be in range [1 to GridSize].

print_info
bool

Print information of board rows,cols and diagonals or not . Use TRUE or FALSE.

BG_GetPieceInfo
int BG_GetPieceInfo(
BG_PieceInfo *piece_info_arr,
size_t arr_len,
int *game_board,
char board_piece,
bool print_info
)

Get information of piece such as position,row/columns/diagonal etc.

Parameters
piece_info_arr
BG_PieceInfo*

Array to receive information of piece . Must be of type 'BG_PieceInfo'.

arr_len
size_t

Length of array. Must be of same size as BoardSize i.e [GridSizeGridSize].

game_board
int*

Your current game board .

board_piece
char

Character denoting board piece.

print_info
bool

Whether to print information of piece rows,cols and diagonals or not . Use TRUE or FALSE.

Returns

On success it return total number of times piece was found on board otherwise return BG_ERROR.

BG_FillBoardRow
bool BG_FillBoardRow(
int *game_board,
int row_num,
char board_piece
)

Fill selected row of game board with board piece.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

row_num
int

Row number to be filled.

board_piece
char

Board piece to fill selected row with.

Returns

If filling was success it returns TRUE otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_FillBoardRows
bool BG_FillBoardRows(
int *game_board,
int *row_nums,
char *board_pieces,
size_t board_pieces_len
)

Fill selected rows of game board with multiple board_pieces.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

row_nums
int*

Array of row numbers to be filled.

board_pieces
char*

Array of board pieces to fill selected row with.

board_pieces_len
size_t

Length of board pieces array.

Returns

If filling was success it returns TRUE otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_FillBoardDiagonal
bool BG_FillBoardDiagonal(
int *game_board,
int diag_num,
int diag_type,
char board_piece
)

Fill selected left/right diagonal of game board with board piece.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

diag_num
int

Diagonal number to be filled.

diag_type
int

Diagonal type to be filled . LEFT or RIGHT diagonal , Use Enum 'DIAGONAL_TYPE' to provide value.

board_piece
char

Board piece to fill selected diagonal with.

Returns

If filling was success it returns TRUE otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_FillBoardDiagonals
bool BG_FillBoardDiagonals(
int *game_board,
int *diag_nums,
int diag_type,
char *board_pieces,
size_t board_pieces_len
)

Fill selected diagonals of game board with multiple board pieces.

Parameters
game_board
int*

Pointer to variable in which game board is stored.

diag_nums
int*

Array of Diagonal numbers to be filled.

diag_type
int

Diagonal type to be filled . LEFT or RIGHT diagonal , Use Enum 'DIAGONAL_TYPE' to provide value.

board_pieces
char*

Array of  board pieces to fill selected diagonal with.

board_pieces_len
size_t

Length of board pieces array.

Returns

If filling was success it returns TRUE otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_InvertBoard

bool invert_bool
)

Invert the game board.

Parameters
invert_bool
bool

Invert the current board or not. Use TRUE or FALSE.

BG_MultiPiece
void BG_MultiPiece(
bool piece_bool
)

Use multi-piece for board_piece character.

Parameters
piece_bool
bool

Whether to use multi-piece or not. Use TRUE or FALSE.

BG_BoardBorder
void BG_BoardBorder(
bool border_bool
)

Draw border of game board.

Parameters
border_bool
bool

Whether draw border of game board or not. Use TRUE or FALSE. (Defaults to TRUE).
